Department approve the deal on the condition that the company sell off at news Medicare part D prescription drug business the merger will allow CBS to offer a wider range of healthcare services including screenings for chronic illnesses and preventative care such as blood sugar monitoring and vaccines
The companies say the goal is to lure more people into pharmacy walking clinics keeping them out of more expensive sites like emergency rooms yet with Asian is also expected to get CBS more leverage in negotiations with pharmaceutical companies over drug prices jumped in NPR News
